author: pburba
msg: Fix for Issue #2883 No-op merge (without skip) should not change mergeinfo.
(merge_cmd_baton): Add member 'operative_merge' to track if the merge is
(merge_path_t): Add member 'propval' to keep track of subtree's *working*

can record if an operative merge ever occurs in the new 'operative_merge'
determine_merges_performed().  Don't update mergeinfo for the target of a
merge when the merge is a no-op.
array so we can return the WC to that state if this is ultimately a no-op
